channel.title: CVE Feed for ivole -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ivole -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-3243|2024-06-06T17:21:43.540Z -- ivole -- customer%20reviews%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Customer Reviews for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized email sending due to a missing capability check on the send_test_email() function in all versions up to, and including, 5.46.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send arbitrary test emails.

item.title: CVE-2024-3243|2024-04-16T12:51:46.885Z -- ivole -- customer%20reviews%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Customer Reviews for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized email sending due to a missing capability check on the send_test_email() function in all versions up to, and including, 5.46.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send arbitrary test emails.
